work.summary: Hootsuite is a social media management platform that allows users to manage social networks, schedule messages, engage your audiences, and measure ROI right from the dashboard
SocialChorus is an Enterprise Advocate Marketing solution enables employees and brand ambassadors to consume, share and create branded content, generating awareness, engagement and sales for brands.
highlights: Worked on the existing application written in a modified version of Rails optimized for Service Oriented Architecture
Maintained the SocialChorus Bookmarklet
Contributed to implementing the mailing notification system using the Sendgrid Polling API
Contributed to the open source front-end framework that SocialChorus has created and used for the application
Used Test Driven Development to maintain and refactor all areas of the application
Wrote tests for services and front-end modules

work.summary: Lighthouse Labs is a developer bootcamp that offers full-time Web Development and iOS programs.
highlights: Guided students on how to approach the problems that they're trying to solve.
Provided code reviews and advice to improve code quality.

work.summary: Contractually is a contract management solution that provides a quick and easy way to manage and automate the entire contract process online.
highlights: Maintained existing application written in Rails and AngularJS
Implemented the ability to have one to many private message threads in contract pages
Used Service Objects to refactor and break down logic in complex tasks to improve code cleanliness and readability
Gave users the ability to customize their email templates in their settings panel
Monitored builds and tests using a continuous integration system
Wrote unit, integration and automated user tests to ensure quality of code. With overall code coverage at 93%

work.summary: Shopify is a fully managed commerce platform that allows merchants to sell products online and in retail with point-of-sale
highlights: Maintained and enhanced a number existing Shopify supported Web Applications written on Ruby on Rails and JavaScript/CoffeeScript.
Wrote Jekyll plugins to support page structure in the Shopify Documentation
Implemented auto-complete search feature in the Shopify App Store using the Swiftype API

volunteer.summary: Ladies Learning Codes is a non-for-profit organization that provides workshops for everyone who wants to learn how to code.
highlights: Instructed Intro to JavaScript workshop in Vancouver
Instructed Girls Learning Code Workshops
Instructed Girls Learning Code Camps
